1: -module(meeting_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: -export([all/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2, groups/0]).
    4: 
    5: 
    6: all() -> [{group, session}].
    7: 
    8: groups() -> [{session, [], [{group, clients}, all_same_owner]},
    9: 			{clients, [parallel, {repeat, 10}], [carla, mark,dog]}].
   10: 
   11: init_per_group(session, Config) ->
   12: 	meeting:start(),
   13: 	Config;
   14: init_per_group(_,Config) ->
   15: 	Config.
   16: 
   17: end_per_group(session, _Config) ->
   18: 	meeting:stop();
   19: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
   20: 	ok.
   21: 
   22: 
   23: carla(_Config) ->
   24: 	meeting:book_room(women),
   25: 	timer:sleep(10),
   26: 	meeting:rent_projector(women),
   27: 	timer:sleep(10),
   28: 	meeting:use_chairs(women).
   29: 
   30: mark(_Config) ->
   31: 	meeting:rent_projector(men),
   32: 	timer:sleep(10),
   33: 	meeting:use_chairs(men),
   34: 	timer:sleep(10),
   35: 	meeting:book_room(men).
   36: 
   37: dog(_Config) ->
   38: 	meeting:rent_projector(animals),
   39: 	timer:sleep(10),
   40: 	meeting:use_chairs(animals),
   41: 	timer:sleep(10),
   42: 	meeting:book_room(animals).
   43: 
   44: all_same_owner(_Config) ->
   45: 	%%[{_, Owner}, {_,Owner}, {_,Owner}] = meeting:get_all_bookings().
   46: 	ok.
